text: Carol Johnson is a former American female long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Johnson represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1962, finishing 31st overall. She also competed at other international competitions. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:American female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Carol Johnson (speed skater)
